short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your 𝕏 (formerly Twitter) posts by easily formatting text with bold, italic, underline, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a versatile toolbar above the 𝕏 (formerly Twitter) post editor, letting you bold, italicize, underline, or strike through text effortlessly. 

🖋️ Perfect for emphasizing key points or adding flair to your messages, xFormatter makes styling tweets intuitive and fun.

🫧 Hide distracting navigation/sidebar elements like Ads, Spaces, Jobs etc.

✨ Grab attention and boost engagement with visually striking tweets.

🧩 Integrates seamlessly with 𝕏, enhancing your tweeting without any hassle.
